# audioTimeStamp

**Instance Property**

The time as an audio timestamp.

## Declaration

```swift
var audioTimeStamp: AudioTimeStamp { get }
```

## Discussion

This is useful for compatibility with lower-level Core Audio and Audio Toolbox API.
title: audioTimeStamp
